wikipedia_page.main: Jon Gregory (21 May 1944 – 9 September 2021) was a British film editor. He began his career with TV series Shoestring (1981), A Year in Provence  (1994), Deeply (2000), The Proposition, (2005), In Bruges (2008), and Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri (2017) for which he received an Academy Award for Best Film Editing nomination at the 90th Academy Awards.Gregory was previously nominated for the BAFTA Award for Best Editing for Four Weddings and a Funeral (1994). He was a member of the American Cinema Editors.Gregory died on 9 September 2021, at the age of 77.
